data.message: How to delete old unused Facebook pages you no longer want = unwanted pages < this would be an idea!. add a way to remove old unwanted pages from your account.

replies.message: Go to your friends list and his the X next to that account.

Talking about Facebook websites... asking them to add a delete feature. i have many Facebook sites from Darklord Storm to The Dark lord and more i just wanna delete some because they are old shty ones i messed up on but no delete option there to remove them.

Hi Anthony. To delete your Page, you'll need to be an admin of that Page. For instructions on how to delete your Page, please visit our Help Center at: https://www.facebook.com/help/www/223786757631885. -Hailey
TY. omg you have no clue how long i have been trying to figure that out lmao i feel like an idiot now...
